chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
naetli: no_append_entries_to_leader_interface
naetsi: no_append_entries_to_self_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
laei: log_all_entries_interface
aelli: append_entries_leaderLogs_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
mili: match_index_leader_interface
matchisi: match_index_sanity_interface
aersi: append_entries_reply_sublog_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> In e es -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h)))

Premises:
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
logIndex = nat : Set
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Notation type := (RaftState.type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P :
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
term = nat : Set
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
lifted_leader_sublog_nw : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> In e es -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h)))
lifted_no_AE_to_leader : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> type (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = Leader -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = t -> False
lifted_append_entries_reply_sublog : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (es : list entry) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> In e es -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h)))
entries_match_nw_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_no_AE_to_self : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> pDst p = pSrc p -> False
entries_gt_0_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
no_append_entries_to_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> type (nwState net (pDst p)) = Leader -> currentTerm (nwState net (pDst p)) = t ->...-> Prop Arguments no_append_entries_to_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_match_nw_1 = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (p' : packet) (t' : term) (n' : name) (pli' : logIndex) (plt' : term) (es' : list entry) (ci' : logIndex) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> In p' (nwPackets net) ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_1 {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
match_index_all_entries_nw = fun net : network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (es : list entry) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = t -> In e (log (snd (nwState net (pDst p)))) -> eTerm e = t -> eIndex e <= maxIndex es -> type (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = Leader -> In (t, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net (pSrc p)))) : network -> Prop
append_entries_reply_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (es : list entry) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es true -> currentTerm (nwState net h) = t -> type (nwState net h) = Leader -> In e es -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments append_entries_reply_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_contiguous_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_contiguous_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> sorted es : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
append_entries_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci ->...-> Prop Arguments append_entries_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
no_append_entries_to_self = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> pDst p = pSrc p -> False : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments no_append_entries_to_self {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leader_sublog_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) ->...-> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd = update_e...
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd =...
wonElection_candidateEntries_rvr : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (e : entry), votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (snd (nwState net (pDst p))))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) <> Candidate
candidateEntries_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> forall e : entry, In e entries ->...-> Prop Arguments candidateEntries_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader ->...-> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n -> In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
candidateEntries_wonElection : forall (net : network) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), one_vote_per_term net -> cronies_votes net -> votes_received_cronies net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h)))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net h)) <> Candidate
log_all_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_all_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries : forall (net : network) (h h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (e : entry), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h (snd (nwState net h)) h' t r -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_requestVoteReply h h' t r (nwState net h), st'))
match_index_all_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (leader : Net.name) (h : name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> eIndex e <= assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (snd (nwState net leader))) h 0 -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) ->...-> Prop Arguments match_index_all_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
votes_received_cronies = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (crony : name), In crony (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h))) -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader \/ type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate -> In crony (cronies (fst (nwState net h)) (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_received_cronies {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

```coq
intros net p t n pli plt es ci h e.
intros Hrin Hnp Heqb Hcteq Ht Hie.
apply lifted_leader_sublog_nw with (p := p) (t := t) (n := n) (pli := pli) (plt := plt) (es := es) (ci := ci) (h := h) (e := e); auto.
Qed.

original: intros net p t n pli plt es ci h e. intros Hrin Hnp Heqb Hcteq Ht Hie. apply lifted_leader_sublog_nw with (p := p) (t := t) (n := n) (pli := pli) (plt := plt) (es := es) (ci := ci) (h := h) (e := e); auto.
